name: bosstaxaccounting-website
description: This project is responsible for packaging and deploying the public website for bosstaxaccounting.com
author: Chris Thaw <chris_thaw@yahoo.com>

scripts.release: yarn install && webpack --mode=production && yarn git-tag-release && yarn docker-build && yarn docker-deploy
scripts.git-commit: git commit -m "Incrementing release verion of BossTaxAccounting to $npm_package_version"
scripts.git-publish: git push -u origin HEAD:master && git push --tags
scripts.git-tag-release: yarn git-add && yarn git-commit && yarn git-tag && yarn git-publish
